trans-unit.source: Provides a label adapter class for the HTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供 HTML 配接器集的標籤配接器類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別主要是由自訂行動頁面和控制項配接器的開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlLabelAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlLabelAdapter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回關聯控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 關聯控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 要接收輸出的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Called by the control's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method to perform rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由控制項的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> 方法呼叫，用以執行呈現。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: Contains the string to be checked.
trans-unit.target: 包含要檢查的字串。

trans-unit.source: Scans a string to determine whether it contains white space characters.
trans-unit.target: 掃描字串，判斷字串是否包含空白字元。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if string contains white space characters; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串包含空白字元則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
